title: Tag 'Utility'
description:
The tag 'utility' isn't showing up on the left hand side with the others.
http://gregtechcommunitywiki.wikispaces.com/space/content?tag=Utility

replies.body: Does anyone know why this is? And if I'm completely wrong, then oops.
I'll fix it then. The left hand side just gets longer and longer though :P
It's just not there, simple as that. Most of the left hand side tags weren't there a month ago

Well, i've been tagging and editing the left side for better navigation.
I still think that instead of "Utility" it should be called "Miscelaneous".
Depends what else would go in each category.
